thread.title: Robots take root on smaller dairy farms, upping production - The Republic
thread.title_full: Robots take root on smaller dairy farms, upping production - The Republic - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: The Republic
title: Robots take root on smaller dairy farms, upping production - The Republic
text:
Robots have taken up residence at some small- and medium-sized dairy farms across the country, providing reliable and more efficient labor and helping the businesses remain viable. Plus, farmers say, the milking technology makes for happier, more productive cows.
 The Republic.
